item.title: CVE-2024-29771|2024-03-27T12:58:25.517Z -- SoftLab -- Dracula Dark Mode - The Revolutionary Dark Mode Plugin For WordPress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in SoftLab Dracula Dark Mode - The Revolutionary Dark Mode Plugin For WordPress allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Dracula Dark Mode - The Revolutionary Dark Mode Plugin For WordPress: from n/a through 1.0.8.
